<<<<<<< HEAD
The diseases of the time, attended by their remedies. By Francis Rous Rous, Francis, 1579-1659.
[24], 526 p.
Printed by William Stansby for Iohn Parker, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the three Pigeons, London : 1622.
A variant (STC 21340a) has title "Diseases ..". Slight print show-through. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
